data.eml:eml: Contribution to the knowledge of the subgenus Rhodobaetis Jacob, 2003 (Ephemeroptera: Baetidae: Baetis) from Central Asia. Part 1

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sroka, Pavel, Godunko, Roman J., Novikova, Eugenia A., Kluge, Nikita J. (2012): Contribution to the knowledge of the subgenus Rhodobaetis Jacob, 2003 (Ephemeroptera: Baetidae: Baetis) from Central Asia. Part 1. Zootaxa 3311: 42-60, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.210699
